answers.answer: Since you have a fatty liver and not fibrosis or cirrhosis then your liver is still considered healthy. I see no problem with continuing with the tramadol. Maintain a heathy low fat diet so your liver doesn't continue to become fattier or even fibrotic.You should always consult you doctor reguarding medication. This only my opinion and I am in no way a medical professional.Randy
